thread.title: Report: 76ers F Robert Covington (knee) expected to miss two weeks
thread.title_full: Report: 76ers F Robert Covington (knee) expected to miss two weeks

author: SI Wire
title: Report: 76ers F Robert Covington (knee) expected to miss two weeks
text:
Report: 76ers F Robert Covington (knee) expected to miss two weeks Sports Illustrated 2 hrs ago SI Wire © Sports Illustrated philadelphia 76ers robert covington knee injury
Philadelphia 76ers small forward Robert Covington is expected to miss two weeks with a sprained MCL and bone bruise in his right knee, reports Yahoo! Sports’ Shams Charania.
AdChoices Covington sustained the injury in the fourth quarter of the 76ers’ final preseason game, an 81–65 loss to the Boston Celtics. Covington landed awkwardly after a missed layup and was helped off the court by teammates.
Covington, 24, is entering his second season with Philadelphia. In 2014–15, he averaged 13.5 points, 1.5 assists and 4.5 rebounds per game. His 167 made three-pointers were the 10th-most in the NBA.
The 76ers have finished last place in the Eastern Conference in each of the last two seasons, winning a combined 37 games. Philadelphia opens its upcoming regular season on Oct. 28 against Boston.
• GOLLIVER: Which NBA coaches are sitting on hot seat entering the season?
- Rohan Nadkarni
